string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: You can use the app to voluntarily note the information about people they’ve met and places they’ve visited. This is important information for tracing the chain of infection. However, it is difficult to recall that information over a time period of two weeks so the contact journal serves as a useful memory aid.

You can now add an entry to your contact journal directly, without having to open the app first. To do so, tap and hold the icon for the #OstaniZdrav App for approximately 2 seconds, until a menu appears, and then tap “Add Journal Entry for Today”.

If the app indicates that you have an increased risk, you can now see whether the risk status is displayed based on one or more exposures with an increased risk or one or more exposures with a low risk.
See daily figures for TAN input.

string-array.name: new_release_title
string-array.item: More Details about Your Risk Status

string-array.name: submission_done_further_info_bullet_points
string-array.item: The duration of isolation is judged by your doctor.

In case of an exacerbation of the disease, consult your chosen personal or emergency physician over the phone. In an emergency, call 112. Tell them that you have been confirmed to be infected with SARS-CoV-2.

string-array.name: submission_intro_bullet_points
string-array.item: If you have a confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection, you can inform others by entering the TAN code. You received the TAN code via SMS.
If you have not yet received the TAN code or it has expired, you can obtain it via the online form in the next step.
